@Testcase

dmem

0x00000000 2

0x00000004 8

0x00000008 13

0x0000000C 15 -> 8

0x00000010 9

0x00000014 7

0x00000018 3

0x0000001C 5

0x00000020 -2

0x00000024 -6

imem

0x0000000 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero (地址4的值(8)存到$a0) ($a0 = 8)

0x00000004 sw $a0 0x0004 $a0 (a0的值(8)存到地址($a0+4)=12) (0x0000000C = 8)

0x00000008 lw $t1 0x0008 $a0 (地址($a0+0x0008)=16的值(9)存到$t1) ($t1 = 9)

0x0000000C lw $t2 0x000C $a0 (地址($a0+0x000C)=20的值(7)存到$t2) ($t2 = 7)

0x00000010 addu $t3 $t1 $t2 ($t3(16) = $t1(9) + $t2(7))($t3 = 16)

0x00000014 lw $t4 0x000C $a0 (地址($a0+0x0010)=24的值(3)存到$t4)($t4 = 3)

0x00000018 subu $t5 $t3 $t4 ($t5(13) = $t3(16) - $t4(3))

0x0000001C lw $t6 0x0014 $zero ($t6 = 7)

0x00000020 subu $t5 $t5 $t4 ($t5(10) = $t5(13) - $t4(3)) ($t5(7) = $t5(10) - $t4(3))

0x00000024 bne $t5 $t6 0xFFFE(-1) (第一次不相等(10!=7) 跳转到0x00000020 第二次相等(7) 继续)

0x00000028 lw $t7 0x0020 $zero ($t7 = -2)

0x0000002C lw $t8 0x0024 $zero ($t8 = -6) 

0x00000030 subu $t8 $t8 $t7 ($t8(-4) = $t8(-6) - $t7(-2)) ($t8(-2) = $t8(-4) - $t7(-2)) ($t8(0) = $t8(-2) - $t7(-2)) 

0x00000034 bne $t8 $zero 0xFFFE(-1)

0x00000038 halt


4 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero = 0x8C040004 = 10001100000001000000000000000100

8 sw $a0 0x0004 $a0 = 0xAC840004 = 10101100100001000000000000000100

12 lw $t1 0x0008 $a0 = 0x8C890008 = 10001100100010010000000000001000

16 lw $t2 0x000C $a0 = 0x8C8A000C = 10001100100010100000000000001100

20 addu $t3 $t1 $t2 = 0x012A5821 = 00000001001010100101100000100001

24 lw $t4 0x000C $a0 = 0x8C8C000C = 10001100100011000000000000001100

28 subu $t5 $t3 $t4 = 0x016C6823 = 00000001011011000110100000100011

32 lw $t6 0x0014 $zero = 0x8C0E0014 = 10001100000011100000000000010100

36 subu $t5 $t5 $t4 = 0x01AC6823 = 00000001101011000110100000100011

40 bne $t5 $t6 0xFFFE = 0x15AEFFFE = 00010101101011101111111111111110

44 lw $t7 0x0020 $zero = 0x8C0F0020 = 10001100000011110000000000100000

48 lw $t8 0x0024 $zero = 0x8C180024 = 10001100000110000000000000100100
 
52 subu $t8 $t8 $t7 = 0x030FC023 = 00000011000011111100000000100011

56 bne $t8 $zero 0xFFFE = 0x1700FFFE = 00010111000000001111111111111110

halt = 0xFFFFFFFF = 11111111111111111111111111111111
